Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Novotel London Blackfriars in London (South Bank), you'll be minutes from Tate Modern and Blackfriars Bridge. This 4-star hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Eye.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 182 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an indoor pool, a sauna, and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in London? This hotel has 2130 square feet (198 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tate Modern - 0.2 km / 0.2 mi
Blackfriars Bridge - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
London Millennium Footbridge - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Unilever PLC - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Globe Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Royal National Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Two Temple Place - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Southbank Centre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
St. Brides' Church - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Royal Festival Hall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Waterloo Bridge - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St. Paul's Cathedral - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
London Temple Church - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
London South Bank University - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Somerset House - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 10.7 km / 6.6 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 24.2 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Novotel London Blackfriars is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
